backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend canister placeholder with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs and titles to their associated source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels for the tab-based navigation refactor and related UI features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document providing short descriptions of each frontend source file, serving as a reference summary of the purpose and key exports of every module in the project.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS file that imports Tailwind directives and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, chart, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app, configuring PWA metadata (manifest, theme color, Apple touch icons) and mounting the root div with the main.tsx module script.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest defining the app name, icons, display mode, theme/background colors, categories, and an 'Add Position' shortcut for the Crypto Position Monitor.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing cache-first for static assets, network-first for HTML and Binance API calls, with install/activate lifecycle handlers to manage versioned caches.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component that renders a sticky header with logo and install/social buttons, a tab navigation bar, and conditionally renders one of four tab components (Dashboard, AI Daily Trades, AI Insights, Risk Management) based on active tab state.
frontend/src/components/AdjustmentSugges: Alert-style card that presents an AI stop-loss or take-profit adjustment suggestion with current vs. proposed levels and accept/dismiss actions.
frontend/src/components/AIDailyTradesSec: Collapsible section component that orchestrates AI daily trade generation, monitoring, and display, showing loading/error states and a grid of AITradeCards with a force-refresh option.
frontend/src/components/AIDailyTradesSum: Summary banner component displaying aggregated AI portfolio PnL (USD and percent), winning/losing/total trade counts, and a live timestamp for the AI daily trades.
frontend/src/components/AIDailyTradesTab: Thin tab wrapper component that renders AIDailyTradesSection inside a spaced container.
frontend/src/components/AIInsightsTab.ts: Tab component that renders per-position AI insights including sentiment gauges, trend predictions, and dismissible adjustment suggestions for each open position.
frontend/src/components/AITradeCard.tsx: Card component displaying a single AI-generated trade with modality badge, entry/current/SL/TP prices, PnL, TP progress bars, and a near-SL warning indicator.
frontend/src/components/DashboardTab.tsx: Main dashboard tab that composes the capital summary, position entry form, and position dashboard into a single layout.
frontend/src/components/ExposureChart.ts: Displays two cards showing asset allocation percentages as progress bars and the long/short capital balance for the current portfolio.
frontend/src/components/InstallButton.ts: Renders a PWA install button that triggers the native install prompt if available, or shows a manual instructions modal if not. Hidden when the app is already installed as a standalone PWA.
frontend/src/components/InstallInstructi: Displays a dialog with step-by-step PWA installation instructions for multiple browsers (Chrome/Edge Android, Safari iOS, Chrome/Edge/Firefox desktop). Each browser guide includes an icon and ordered steps.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioExposur: Dashboard card showing portfolio-level exposure metrics (capital deployed, total leverage exposure, capital at risk) with optional total capital context and warning flags for high deployment or risk percentages.
frontend/src/components/PositionCard.tsx: Card component for a single trading position displaying PnL, proximity to take-profit/stop-loss levels, AI adjustment suggestions, and collapsible AI insights including sentiment, trend prediction, and recommendations.
frontend/src/components/PositionDashboar: Container component that fetches live prices for all positions via a monitoring hook and renders a list of PositionCards, or an empty-state prompt with an add button when no positions exist.
frontend/src/components/PositionEntryFor: Form for creating a new trading position; collects symbol, type, leverage, entry price, and investment amount, then fetches historical klines to auto-calculate take-profit levels and stop-loss before submitting.
frontend/src/components/PositionSizeCalc: A React component that calculates optimal position sizes based on capital, risk percentage, entry price, stop loss, and leverage inputs, with results displayed and an optional apply callback.
frontend/src/components/RiskManagementTa: A tab layout component that composes the PositionSizeCalculator, PortfolioExposureDashboard, and ScenarioSimulator into a single risk management view, showing a placeholder when no positions exist.
frontend/src/components/ScenarioSimulato: A component that simulates portfolio P&L impact for custom or preset market price change scenarios using a slider and preset buttons, with liquidation risk and capital loss warnings.
frontend/src/components/SentimentGauge.t: Displays market sentiment (bullish/bearish/neutral) for a given symbol using a score badge, strength progress bar, and a list of contributing indicator factors fetched via a custom hook.
frontend/src/components/StopLossRecommen: Renders a stop loss card showing price, distance from current price, max loss, capital risk percentage, reasoning, and a partial-taking strategy alert, with visual warnings when price is near the stop.
frontend/src/components/TabNavigation.ts: A sticky top navigation bar with four tabs (Dashboard, AI Daily Trades, AI Insights, Risk Management) that highlights the active tab and calls a callback on tab change.
frontend/src/components/TakeProfitRecomm: Renders a list of take-profit level cards showing target price, distance from current price, expected profit in USD and percent, and reasoning, with visual highlighting when a level is reached.
frontend/src/components/TotalCapitalInpu: A form card component that lets users input and save their total trading capital to local storage, with validation and success feedback via toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/TotalCapitalSumm: A card component that displays a capital overview (deployed, at-risk, and available capital percentages) based on stored total capital and current positions, with an edit dialog to update the capital value.
frontend/src/components/TrendPredictionC: A card component that displays AI-generated short-term and medium-term trend predictions (direction and confidence) for a given trading symbol.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React Query hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdjustmentSuggesti: A React Query hook that fetches hourly Binance kline data for each position and generates trade adjustment suggestions, refreshing every 30 seconds.
A React Query hook that generates or retrieves daily AI trades for four trading modalities, caching them for 24 hours and resetting them each UTC day.
A React Query hook that fetches live prices for AI trades every 5 seconds and computes PnL and status (Open, TPHit, SLHit) for each trade.
frontend/src/hooks/useAITradeStorage.ts: A utility hook providing localStorage read/write/clear operations for daily AI trades, keyed by UTC date to ensure daily resets.
frontend/src/hooks/useBinancePairs.ts: A React Query hook that fetches and caches the list of Binance perpetual trading pairs for one hour.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider for ICP, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status via a React context hook.
React hook that memoizes portfolio exposure calculations by calling `calculatePortfolioExposure` on an array of positions with prices.
frontend/src/hooks/usePositionMonitoring: React Query hook that polls Binance every 5 seconds to fetch current prices for all tracked positions and computes PnL, distance to TP1, and distance to stop-loss for each.
frontend/src/hooks/usePositionStorage.ts: React hook that persists and retrieves trading positions from localStorage, exposing add, update, and delete operations.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstall.ts: React hook that manages PWA installation state by listening to `beforeinstallprompt` and `appinstalled` browser events, and exposes an `install()` function to trigger the native install prompt.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder/empty module noting that all data operations go directly to the Binance API and the backend canister is unused.
React Query hook that fetches 100 hourly klines from Binance Futures and runs `analyzeSentiment` on close prices and volumes, refreshing every 30 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrendPrediction.ts: React Query hook that fetches hourly and daily klines from Binance Futures and returns short-term and medium-term trend predictions via `predictTrend`, refreshing every 5 minutes.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind CSS, defines a golden-themed OKLCH CSS variable palette for both light and dark modes, and adds PWA standalone-mode adjustments and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped in `QueryClientProvider` and `InternetIdentityProvider`.
frontend/src/services/binanceApi.ts: Service module providing typed functions to fetch perpetual pairs, current prices (single and batch), and OHLCV klines from the Binance Futures REST API.
frontend/src/types/adjustment.ts: TypeScript types for TP/SL adjustment suggestions and their acceptance history.
frontend/src/types/aiTrade.ts: TypeScript types for AI-generated trades, including trading modality, status, entry/exit levels, and a price-enriched variant.
frontend/src/types/calculator.ts: TypeScript types for position-size calculator inputs (capital, risk %, entry/SL prices, leverage) and the resulting size, contracts, and risk/reward output.
frontend/src/types/exposure.ts: TypeScript types describing portfolio exposure metrics including per-asset breakdown, long/short balance, correlation risks, and warning flags.
frontend/src/types/position.ts: TypeScript types for trading positions, including take-profit levels, stop-loss recommendations, and a price-enriched variant with PnL and distance fields.
frontend/src/types/prediction.ts: TypeScript types for trend predictions (direction, confidence, time horizon) and their historical accuracy records.
frontend/src/types/scenario.ts: TypeScript types for what-if scenario analysis, covering inputs, per-position outcomes (PnL, TP/SL/liquidation flags), aggregate results, and preset scenarios.
frontend/src/types/sentiment.ts: TypeScript types for market sentiment analysis results, including a bullish/bearish/neutral score, strength value, and contributing indicator factors.
frontend/src/utils/adjustmentSuggestions: Utility that analyzes market conditions (ATR, volatility, support/resistance) for a position and generates TP/SL adjustment suggestions with confidence scores and reasoning.
frontend/src/utils/aiTradeSelection.ts: Computes technical indicators (EMA, RSI, ATR, momentum) from Binance kline data and uses modality-specific configs (Scalping, DayTrading, SwingTrading) to generate AI trade signals with entry, take-profit, and stop-loss levels.
Calculates portfolio-level exposure metrics including total capital deployed, weighted average leverage, long/short balance, per-asset exposure percentages, correlated position risks, and warning flags.
frontend/src/utils/pnlCalculations.ts: Provides utility functions to calculate PnL in USD and percent for long/short leveraged positions, and the percentage distance between current and target prices.
frontend/src/utils/positionSizeCalculato: Calculates optimal position size, number of contracts, risk amount, and reward amount based on capital, risk percentage, stop-loss distance, entry price, and leverage.
frontend/src/utils/registerServiceWorker: Registers a service worker for PWA support, handles update detection with a user confirmation prompt, and schedules hourly update checks.
frontend/src/utils/scenarioSimulator.ts: Simulates portfolio outcomes under hypothetical price change scenarios, determining projected PnL, TP/SL hits, and liquidation risk for each position, with predefined market presets.
frontend/src/utils/sentimentAnalysis.ts: Analyzes market sentiment from close prices and volumes by computing RSI, MACD, price action trend, volume trend, and momentum, then aggregating bullish/bearish signals into a sentiment score.
frontend/src/utils/stopLossCalculator.ts: Calculates a recommended stop-loss price for a leveraged position using ATR-based distance, support/resistance levels, and a leverage-adjusted maximum risk percentage, returning loss amounts and reasoning.
Calculates three take-profit levels (conservative, moderate, aggressive) for a trading position using volatility, support/resistance, leverage, and position type to determine target prices and expected profit in USD and percentage.
frontend/src/utils/technicalAnalysis.ts: Provides technical analysis utility functions including ATR calculation, volatility (standard deviation of returns), support/resistance detection via price clustering, and risk/reward ratio computation.
frontend/src/utils/totalCapitalStorage.t: Manages persisting and retrieving a total capital value in localStorage, with validation to ensure the stored value is a positive number.
frontend/src/utils/trendPrediction.ts: Predicts short-term (1–24 hours) and medium-term (1–7 days) price trend direction and confidence using moving averages, momentum, and volatility derived from hourly and daily price arrays.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color tokens, extended border radii, box shadows, accordion keyframe animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state (version 21) for a crypto trading monitoring app, documenting architecture decisions, existing features, and known issues such as unreliable PWA installation.
